room_title: Escape room "STAR WARS™: Secrets of the Empire VR" by The Void Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Fun and entertaining - loved the Star Wars experience

room_title: Escape room "STAR WARS™: Secrets of the Empire VR" by The Void Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: If you're like me, you haven't really played any virtual reality (VR) games because it's expensive to buy a home system only to be obsolete next year, especially with technology going a million miles a minute. That said, I love how companies like The Void have popped up to bring the VR experience to you but 100x better than any regular-consumer home system could. The $30/person is well worth it and it's just a plain old fun thing to do.

room_title: Escape room "STAR WARS™: Secrets of the Empire VR" by The Void Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Absolutely loved the experience! We did the Star Wars experience, but are planning on returning to do the other two!
